website_summaries.verdict: As seen on Shark Tank, this canopy comes with the size, material, and features you need.
pros: Use as carseat cover, breastfeeding cover, shopping cart cover, high chair cover, or blanket
cons: Some users report fabric doesn't wear well

customer_reviews.title: I am so disappointed in my cover
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in my cover. It is flimsy and poorly made. Ive had it for two weeks and it’s baggy and has a hole in the fabric (because it’s so thin) where it got caught on the ... car seat (that it was designed to cover). I have friends who have different prints and theirs seem like better quality. I was honestly concerned I ordered a knock-off since I ordered on Amazon. I paid more for this because of the great reputation. I wouldn’t recommend buying this - use an old t-shirt (it will hold up better) and save $40.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes yes yes!
customer_reviews.text: This has saved me in so many ways! Best purchase ever. So easy to use while breastfeeding in public and also to put over her car seat when raining. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dobyns

customer_reviews.title: Stretched out.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great concept. It covers my little in the car seat and keeps people from touching my baby but my milksnob stretched WAY out after the third use. Not sure if I got a "bad" one or what.
customer_reviews.author: SUHarris

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, stylish, perfect
customer_reviews.text: One if my favorite baby products, this is a must! I don’t breastfeed but still use this every day as a carseat cover to keep prying eyes and hands away, and later as a shopping cart or high chair cover. Had one for my son that still looks brand new despite many washes (air dry). Great for a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this as a carseat cover
customer_reviews.text: I love this Milk Snob cover for our baby carseat. As for nursing I haven't had too much success using it. I bought one for my cousin as well for her baby shower and I know she uses it and likes it for her carseat as well. I've had people comment to me that they think it's pretty cool when I'm out and about. It's super soft, stretchy, and thing material. The pattern goes with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Great product...total lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: Lifesaver! I had premature twins and to take them anywhere these past 3 months I had to be extra careful about lookie-loos trying to touch them or exposing them to germs before their shots. This helped soooooo much. Just throw it over the car seat and it sends the signal that “babies are asleep.” Also seems to help them nap on the go since it blocks out the distractions.
customer_reviews.author: StacyJ2001

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept of this item. I always use it over the car seat to protect my newborn from germs when in public places. I am giving this 4 stars because I was dissapointed by how the item looked only after one wash using a cold delicate cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Shab San

customer_reviews.title: I DID really like this product but it’s developing holes all over the ...
customer_reviews.text: I DID really like this product but it’s developing holes all over the place and yes, I washed according to instructions!! So disappointing because it’s only a simple loop of fabric and if it’s only going to last a few months the price is ridiculous!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alison B.

customer_reviews.title: It’s great! Would buy again... may have to...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife. She nurses and it helps keep people from touching our baby! Love the concept! The only thing was within 4 weeks it has 3 tiny holes on it; my wife is going to try to sew it so it does not spread. All we use it for is for the car seat and when she nursed. I don’t know how the fabric got holes in it so not super durable but we recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Lattimore

customer_reviews.title: Love our milksnob cover as a stroller cover and also ...
customer_reviews.text: Love our milksnob cover as a car seat cover and also nursing cover! Love the concept that it keeps germs out when we're in public (newborn baby and I wanna keep her as safe as possible). I've had many nursing covers, but this is by far my favorite. Super breathable fabric so I don't feel super hot while nursing, even during the summer heat! 4 stars because after the first initial wash (following instructions) I was disappointed with how it looked. Still did it's job and worked great though
customer_reviews.author: shanice Baun

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: A must have for all nursing mothers. I bought this for My granddaughter and she loved it so much that I bought a second one. It's ammusy have, Light weight and live the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn A Tefank

customer_reviews.title: Not a must have item
customer_reviews.text: Don't use it. Can't see to nurse. Just use it to cover the carrier in the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Familylife

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for covering the carseat. Impossible to use as a nursing cover.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina H

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but it stretches and sags after one use.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t wait to buy a Milk Snob cover, it’s probably one of the best ideas for baby/nursing. They didn’t make them when I had my first two kids. Unfortunately, I wore it one day and it stretched out so bad! (I am a very small person, 4’11,110lbs) I figured washing it would fix the problem but it’s even more saggy now. I don’t have an agitator in my washer so it didn’t get pulled on that. I still use it but it droops down when I’m nursing. I haven’t used it as a car seat cover but I don’t think it will even work as one now.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great for carseat cover and nursing cover
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this cover adorable, it is super lightweight and versatile. It fits great over a carseat and I don't feel like I'm suffocating the baby. It is breathable and light. I also love it as a nursing cover. I have the apron style cover as well but I prefer this one because it has full coverage. I used to fight with keeping my back covered when I had to pull my shirt up. But, with this product, I am fully covered.
customer_reviews.author: ktothetc

customer_reviews.title: Best baby purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Best baby purchase! I use this all the time when I nursed daughter in public. I feel so much more comfortable with this. It’s very soft and stretchy. In the warmer weather I used it as a car seat cover as well. Washes well in the washer. Very versatile product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanienb

customer_reviews.title: Nice car seat cover, not suitable for nursing
customer_reviews.text: This works great as a car seat cover- but it the absolute worst for a breast feeding cover. I was looking forward to using this for multiple things. It rides up and is so darn hot when you are nursing. You also cany see anything because the neck hole is pretty small. I can imagine it works well in a shopping cart, I don’t bring my child so I don’t know for sure. But definitely not a suitable nursing cover
customer_reviews.author: spaghetti321

customer_reviews.title: ... much cheaper ones out there but I’ve heard such amazing things about the milk snob brand
customer_reviews.text: I was SO excited to finally have splurged $36 on this canopy cover even though there are much cheaper ones out there but I’ve heard such amazing things about the milk snob brand, i received my product in good time and it was packaged perfectly, i but
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: A little back ground; our third child was born 6 weeks early, 4 weeks in the NICU. 2 older brothers. Love this product! I do not breastfeed but we use it when baby gets over stimulated. With older brothers sometimes that happens fast. I also love using it as a carseat carrier. Especially love that it makes it harder for people to touch baby.
customer_reviews.author: A.Weber

customer_reviews.title: I love it but feel for the price it should’ve held ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this for roughly 2 weeks and it’s starting to unravel already. I love it but feel for the price it should’ve held up longer.
customer_reviews.author: Kinsey

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and convenient!
customer_reviews.text: This works great to cover the car seat in lieu of a face mask or when we're out and our son needs to nap. It also works well as a nursing cover because it's stretchy, soft and breathable.
customer_reviews.author: TXKateNVA

customer_reviews.title: Holes in cover
customer_reviews.text: This was my FAVORITE baby registry purchase and I couldn’t wait to use it! Finally opened it today and noticed there’s holes in it. I’m so sad. I don’t have time to send it back and wait for another either because I’m having baby and second. So bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie

customer_reviews.title: Had such high hopes for this adorable cover, but when I washed it the blue ...
customer_reviews.text: Had such high hopes for this adorable cover, but when I washed it the blue bled everywhere. I followed the instructions exactly and it’s ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Trice

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy knock off brands, this is the best!
customer_reviews.text: This fabric is so soft, stretchy, and breathable! We live in Texas and baby didn't get any hotter underneath the privacy of this cover while eating. We have also used it as a blanket while traveling and it is very soft. I have purchased other knock-off brands and nothing can compare to this. I highly recommend Milk Snob, and always buy one as a baby shower gift because I loves mine so much!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Life changing!!
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously life changing! Best nursing cover I've tried and also love using it to cover car seat/stroller when I'm on walks & it's windy or cold. Bedise it being so versatile, the quality is amazing & the fact that it's so stylish is a plus too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love milk snob if i would buy ever color i would they have great patterns colors are vibrant. I have also purchased a black one and it comes true black great material doesn’t fade.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Magallanes

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best thing I purchased for baby #2
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best thing I purchased for baby #2. Keeps the wind, sun, and cold air off baby. Completely breathable and there is an opening at the top to see the baby and vent. I am using this on a peg perego infant carrier and works like a charm. Would highly recommend this product!!!! I have also used it as a nursing cover, but it gets pretty hot under there. Better as a car seat cover, but I have needed to use it as a nursing cover in a jam.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron K Wendte

customer_reviews.title: I really like this cover for both the car seat and for ...
customer_reviews.text: Update: the fabric has not worn well at all. Unfortunately, it has little holes in several areas where there is stitching. For the price I would have expected this to have held up! I really like this cover for both the car seat and for nursing. Other nursing covers have been to restrictive or just get in the way. I love it most for covering the car seat when in public or out on walks to block the sun. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Crappy!
customer_reviews.text: Already has holes in it and feels flimsy. I’ve been using it for almost 3 months and it’s already falling apart. I hand wash it and set it out to dry too.
customer_reviews.author: Ana T.

customer_reviews.title: Reliable in receipt. SO VERY SOFT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift so can’t review the usage aspects. However, the product was received promptly and the material is SO VERY SOFT! Perfect for use with a baby. And my inspection of the product made me feel confident that this will perform as represented, in every aspect.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Sandrow-Scull

customer_reviews.title: So cute and so soft!
customer_reviews.text: Love love this car seat cover, it’s definitely one of the nicest ones made! It washes up so good and it’s really easy to peek in on your little one! So soft and I loved it so much I bought my friend one and she loved it too! Stretches so easy!
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Full coverage while feeding baby
customer_reviews.text: I got this solely for covering the car seat while out in crazy Colorado Springs weather. But I now use it more as a nursing cover. I love how lightweight it is so baby and I aren’t overheating. I love how it covers my back and front, bc nursing mamas know some shirts need to be lifted to feed baby and with some nursing covers, they only cover the front view. Very happy with my purchase. I’ll be getting another one!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail M. Fowler

customer_reviews.title: You wont be disapointed!
customer_reviews.text: I love this, it's so incredibly soft. This is my third baby, and the first time using a nursing cover. But I love it, makes nursing my infant in public so much more comfortable. Its perfect as a car seat cover.
customer_reviews.author: melinda spencer

customer_reviews.title: positively surprised
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect to like this cover so much. It's super soft material, cute print and it look I will get tone of use from this.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: A bit heated
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could love this. It looks great and feels great on me, but my baby gets SO sweaty underneath this thing. It traps the heat and isn't very breathable. My old school one that looks like an apron works better for my baby. They should make this with a more breathable material.
customer_reviews.author: J. Choy

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping peoples eyes off your newborn
customer_reviews.text: I love love my Milk Snob cover, great for keeping peoples eyes off your baby and equally as important while feeding baby in public or in front of people. Great material, stretchy and this milk snob washes well. I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Maureen B.

customer_reviews.title: Super soft material
customer_reviews.text: Super soft material. Multipurpose. Works great. The only thing I wish was that when using as a nursing cover, the fabric was a little more sturdy around the neck so I could see my little one and what I’m doing.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING product!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what I would do without this! I love it and my baby loves it. It actually helps him fall asleep when we are out and about because he can’t see everything going on so that’s definitely a bonus when he’s sleepy.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Wife Approved and Dad Approved
customer_reviews.text: This cover is pretty slick. We enjoy it. would recommend. Very stretchy but firm.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey Morales

customer_reviews.title: Baby Shower Gift
customer_reviews.text: My recipient loved this gift, works well, very soft, great material, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Lott-Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed!
customer_reviews.text: Just received in the mail 3 days ago and there is already a tear! So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: KAD

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Cover
customer_reviews.text: Love this cover! It is so versatile and can be used to nurse, over a car seat, in a shipping cart and so much more! Will be using with my next child as it still has tons of life left after my first.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This carseat cover is amazing! Keeps the warm in and people out! Lol also helps my little one sleep when we are out and about!
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne M.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite nursing cover
customer_reviews.text: This is the second color I have ordered. I love this nursing cover and get many compliments. I use it as a nursing cover, car seat cover, and as a scarf! It is so easy to use with no hassle getting baby fed in public while maintaining a comfortable level of modesty. And yes.. I saw this on Shark Tank!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love these covers. Super soft, cute and love that they’re made in the USA!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was hestiente to purchase this because of the price but when my baby turned a month old I caved in and I wish I purchased it sooner!! Perfect to cover carseat when baby is napping, blocks out wind and the bright sun. Making nursing baby in public a breeze with plenty of pricey
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and cute gift for a new mom!
customer_reviews.text: i love this cover. It’s perfect for baby in crazy weather climates. Helps with nursing in public. A great product to get a new mom that has multiple functions!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great for bucket seat carrier. Doesnt blown off.
customer_reviews.text: not so great for nursing as I cant see my childs face when nursing (its stretchy and not loose) but when i use it as a car seat cover, I love it!. The wind doesnt blown it open or off and I can keep people who want to peek in and wake baby out as the hole is right by the handle-which either on my arm or my hand. Great baby shower gift idea.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected! Super cute design, works for everything you need it to. Kind of a harsh smell out of the package, but I washed it once, and it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS SO AWESOME! I use this product every single time I ...
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS SO AWESOME! I use this product every single time I have the carseat with me and it is so nice to have. Works great for nursing and keeps people from trying to touch my baby!
customer_reviews.author: Schroe

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Buy it! Don’t even think twice! The fabric is breathable, this is so versatile, and truly worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Olga Dimens

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Cute and functional.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It’s really helpful to have on hand on really cold days. Serves as a cute breastfeeding/pumping scarf and it’s fashionable enough to throw around my neck on the way to work. Washes well. A great baby registry gift!
customer_reviews.author: Angela R. Bethea

customer_reviews.title: Best product out there for sun protection use in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Best product out there for sun protection use in the car. Infants love the black and white patterns - use is numerous and useful. It is very easy to figure out. Jackie
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the material of these and they are super great quality. I buy them as baby gifts for all my friends and have used them with my own little one. They stay on the car seat very well and it doesn’t slide up.
customer_reviews.author: Aj

customer_reviews.title: Great breastfeeding cover
customer_reviews.text: This is the best breastfeeding cover! Super lightweight and breathable- worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: As Described
customer_reviews.text: I haven't technically got to use this product yet, as I am 36 weeks pregnant but love the look and feel of it.
customer_reviews.author: wendy scott

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: this would make a wonderful Baby Shower gift for the mother. My daughter just loves it. Don't be fooled by other brands. This is just the best, washes great, so soft, best nursing top ever to be made, never stretches out of shape, easy to carry along with you where ever you go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a baby shower gift. She loved it and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Tangee Marcy

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Rips easy and gets dirty fast. Doesn’t cover car seat all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn J. Bell

customer_reviews.title: This was my daughter-in-law‘s favorite baby gift
customer_reviews.text: This was my daughter-in-law‘s favorite baby gift. I bought a recent one for my hairdresser who is pregnant. Can’t say enough nice things about this !
customer_reviews.author: Karon E.

customer_reviews.title: I’ve used this twice now and I just put it ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this twice now and I just put it over my car seat (maxi cosi) and it ripped.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Marie Lorentz

customer_reviews.title: Best invention ever!
customer_reviews.text: Its awesome, I can feed my baby in public without having to worry about someone staring at me.
customer_reviews.author: NoblesJ

customer_reviews.title: Best nursing cover and more!
customer_reviews.text: I was gifted a Milk Snob cover for my baby shower and it quickly became my favorite nursing cover. It’s now my go-to gift for all baby showers.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful cover. The material is high quality and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Skube

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS! My baby is only two weeks old and we’ve already used this a bunch of times! So handy! So soft and pretty too! This is one of my new “must haves” for a newborn!!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Sizemore

customer_reviews.title: great stitching, worth spending the money on the original
customer_reviews.text: Soft, well designed, great stitching, worth spending the money on the original. Get compliments everywhere on how genius design is
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Love the security & safety it provides in all the amazing patterns!!!
customer_reviews.text: We love our milk snob cover!!! Getting a second pattern soon 💞. Great to keep strangers from stopping you to see or touch the baby!!! And bonus works as a nursing cover!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Soft high quality material. Stretchy and fits great over our britax car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Love the design!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I registered for this for my baby shower. I have used it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sassy and functional!
customer_reviews.text: A great way to look like a sassy mom and keep the newborn protected from people abs weather elements. I love how easy it is to use and how great it looks. I've received so many compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: Monique Bearden

customer_reviews.title: Must have item
customer_reviews.text: I use this for breastfeeding and I love it. It's stretchy and easy to use. I pull it over my carrier when I'm walking baby around. Will be using it with my second!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Signature Stripes!!!
customer_reviews.text: A milk snob cover was @ the top of my baby list!!! I love it! I got the signature stripes , since I didn't know what I was having!! It's so stylish, and compactable!!!! Just makes nursing life a breeze!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aspenbc

customer_reviews.title: Must-have for nursing moms!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this countless times to make nursing in public more comfortable! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sheena

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for plus size
customer_reviews.text: Great for plus size and growing baby! I was worried about fit, but it’s stetchy and durable
customer_reviews.author: Amy Richelle

customer_reviews.title: Soft and useful
customer_reviews.text: Soft. I keep it in diaper bag and use to feed her on the go or cover when I pump
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had different brands of nursing covers, but nothing compares to my milk snob! I love it! It’s thick!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile. Love the fabric. Wish I'd had it with my first.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lager

customer_reviews.title: Made well.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely this product. It’s so soft, it’s well made and the material is very breathable. I was a bit worried about it being too thick to be able to use here in Texas. Let’s talk about the print! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: E.M

customer_reviews.title: Great for carseat and nursing!
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for covering the carseat, nursing, and even as a blanket. As soon as little man is big enough I'll use it for the grocery cart too. It's a perfect gift especially for nursing moms!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have for parents!
customer_reviews.text: Love my milk snob! This is the second one I have bought and I do not leave the house without it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Great Product-recommend for all moms
customer_reviews.text: very satisfied and happy to find in Amazon with free shipping! Great product-pricey but does what it's intended to do, washes beautifully and serves many purposes.
customer_reviews.author: cheermom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for blocking out sun and as a nursing cover
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect car seat cover!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cover!! Super soft and stretchy material. Fits over my Britax car seat perfectly! Great to shield my perfect little newborn but still breathable!
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Cheap fabric? Love the uses for it
customer_reviews.text: Love the many uses for this product, I literally use it in one or more ways daily. However I noticed today that there are little holes appearing all over it and I’m not sure why. I’ve followed the care instructions. Kind of disappointing as I haven’t had it that long.
customer_reviews.author: Khrystyna Stark

customer_reviews.title: Material is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love it! The material is soft and flexible. It does exactly what it’s suppose to do. It’s breathable and comfortable when I have to nurse in public.. I never leave home without it!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa L

customer_reviews.title: Best nursing cover
customer_reviews.text: There are others less expensive— I’ve tried them— but the quality of milk snobs are incomparable. They are lightweight but not see through, large enough to cover but not smother, and really cute.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Baby cover
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cover for the carrier and nursing. This is my second one.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan R

customer_reviews.title: Hole after two weeks
customer_reviews.text: Edited review: I emailed Milksnob and they shipped me a new cover free of charge. Excellent customer service. Very disappointed - had this less than two weeks and it already has a hole. Was expecting better quality at the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kailey0121

customer_reviews.title: Love all the uses I can get out of this
customer_reviews.text: Love all the uses I can get out of this! My favorite part is being able to use it as a cover for when I breast feed.
customer_reviews.author: Joss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Material is soft, breathable and stretchy. So much better than other nursing covers I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought it as a gift and my sister in law loves it. will be getting one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany JohnsonTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Must have on registry
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for keeping baby covered and hidden from people wanting to get in his face. Also a lifesaver for breastfeeding in public!
customer_reviews.author: Tayler

customer_reviews.title: Best Baby Cover
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my sister in law and she loves it! This is a multi use cover. It is so versatile! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Morrell

customer_reviews.title: Nice material
customer_reviews.text: Love how soft the material is and it last after washing! This is my 3rd milk snob cover and I’m happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa J Y

customer_reviews.title: Must have! Soft and very versatile.
customer_reviews.text: This product is definitely a mommy must have! It is super soft and stretchy. It washes well. We use it for so many things! 10/10 recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Britney M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Flexible & the material is so soft! I recommend the milk snob to everyone I know
customer_reviews.author: Destiny Goodreault

customer_reviews.title: I think she liked it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter in law. I think she liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable and versatile

product_meta.title: Milk Snob Cover Hampton Rose
product_meta.description: Color:Hampton RoseThe original Milk Snob Cover is a fitted infant car seat cover that can also be used as a cover for nursing, shopping carts, high chairs, infant swings and more. Milk Snob Covers are handcrafted using premium rayon blend fabric.
feature_bullets: 4-way stretch provides a custom fit on any infant car seat
True 360° coverage for extra comfort while nursing
Provides shade, privacy, and protection against weather
Manufactured and safety-tested in the U.S.A.

specifications.Safety warning: Never leave your child covered while unattended. Always remove cover off your child's car seat before placing it into a vehicle.
specifications.Best uses: Car seat cover, nursing cover, car seat canopy
